resources.string: NYC DJ offers the city\'s best DJs. Browse our artists or book a party, wedding, or event. NYC DJ makes it easy with reservation and price quote forms that can get you started today!
"Amon Tobin is considered to be one of the most influential electronic music artists in the world. He is noted for his unusual methodology in sound design and music production, and has"
"released seven major studio albums under the London-based Ninja Tune record label."
"Annie MacManus, popularly known as Annie Mac, is an Irish DJ and television presenter. She is perhaps best known as the eponymous host of a self-titled electronic dance music show on BBC Radio"
"1 in the United Kingdom, as well as a chill-out music show entitled The Musical Hot Water Bottle on Sunday evenings."
"Ferry Corsten has produced and remixed under many aliases since the release of his first record at the age of sixteen. As a teenager he saved money to buy his first keyboard by washing cars,"
"and selling mix tapes to kids in his neighbourhood. He now routinely plays at events all over the world with crowds in excess of tens of thousands."

"Skrillex, is an electronic musician and singer-songwriter who grew up in Northeast Los Angeles and in Northern California. After a period as lead singer for American post-hardcore band From First to Last,"
"Skrillex launched a successful solo electronic career in 2007"
